message.content:
1. There were unilateral TKR patients who received tranexamic acid.
2. There were bilateral TKR patients who received tranexamic acid.
3. The unilateral TKR patients who received tranexamic acid had a measurement of 160ml.
4. The bilateral TKR patients who received tranexamic acid had a measurement of 286ml.

messages.content:
Statement: Whereas it was 160ml and 286 ml respectively in unilateral(U/L) and bilateral(B/L) TKR patients who received tranexamic acid.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
